channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Bloomberg gives $600 million to four Black medical schools’ endowments
item.description: Michael Bloomberg’s organization Bloomberg Philanthropies says it will give $600 million to the endowments of four historically Black medical schools.

item.title: Energy Department awards $2.2B to strengthen the electrical grid and add clean power
item.description: The Department of Energy on Tuesday announced $2.2 billion in funding for eight projects across 18 states to strengthen the electrical grid against increasing extreme weather, advance the transition to cleaner electricity and meet a growing demand for power.

item.title: Fast-moving San Bernardino wildfire torches hillside community, forcing evacuations
item.description: Several homes burned Monday as a fast-moving wildfire torched a California hillside community, triggering evacuations while hundreds of firefighters tried to control the blaze.
